website_summaries.verdict: An affordable jewelry-making kit with supplies to craft necklaces, rings, bracelets, and more.
pros: We love the cute flower theme
Great for improving hand-eye coordination and learning about repeating patterns
cons: Some kits arrived with all the beads spilled out

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous. My kids played with it for hours. Most importantly to me! Second to that is all the contents were as advertised. This seems to not be the case with craft packets. But I trust this company and will be buying more from them. I already have more kits from this brand in my lists and can’t wait to buy more. Thank you for your great quality, great packaging, and keeping on your promise to deliver what is in your kit as advertised. It means everything!!! Oh and the price point seems just about right in comparison to other projects available at this time.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: A sad gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: These are a big letdown. Poorly glued paper-covered boxes, little paper sacks with tiny beads spilling out inside, flimsy and bent needles—unless the one I got was used. I am sending them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Hardr

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use- do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned, this kit is completely ridiculous. The holes are tiny and the thread shreds, making it basically impossible for anyone, even an adult, to complete the jewelry according to the instructions. The holes in the beads and flowers are almost too small to thread one day but many of the items require threading through the hole once and then back again. We tried using tweezers and needles with no success. I have a very disappointed 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Beads spilled everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend. Most of the beads were spilled in the box upon arrival. Bad presentation...couldn’t give as a birthday present as I planned and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Neat little case!
customer_reviews.text: The box was a bit smaller than I expected, but definitely lots of little pieces. My kid is7 and still needs some supervision and help with building stuff, would probably be better for an older kid.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The string that comes with this is too thick to fit through most of the beads, especially for a child. I've been helping by using a needle to thread them through, but some you are supposed to thread through twice, and if you try it shreds the string as you push it through.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 yr old granddaughter loves to make jewelry. This little case is really cute and has lots of cool stuff in it. She was delighted when she opened it. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Loves the flower beads! Bought this for my 6 year old and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a little purse
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my granddaughter. I love the packaging. It’s like a little purse!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to string beads
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the beads are way too small for a 5 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love Kid Made Modern products
customer_reviews.text: This made a great birthday gift for a 6-year old girl. We love all the Kid Made Modern crafting and jewelry kits we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: AMathes

customer_reviews.title: Fun kit
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids that love to make jewelry. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay lambrich

customer_reviews.title: Hard to make
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this. The holes are way too small for the threads provided. Hard enough time threading through once, let alone twice....forget about it! Could not make any"flower petal" jewelry at all. Frustrated 7 year old and her mom!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ha

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t make the flower petal jewelry with multiple flowers...can’t thread through holes with 2 strings and some of the beads don’t fit through one string. Junk! I bought through Kids Made Modern...surprised by good reviews on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Zwack

product_meta.title: Kid Made Modern Petal Party Jewelry Making Kit - Kids DIY Crafts Supplies
feature_bullets: UNLOCK YOUR KIDS CREATIVITY - Craft kit comes with 600 glass beads, 209 plastic beads, 20 flower sequins, 16 jump rings, 2 clips, 2 earrings & 3 threads
SHOW STOPPING JEWELRY & CRAFT PROJECTS - This craft kit is an open-ended opportunity to learn and be creative
DIY CRAFT MATERIALS - Allow your creative juices to flow while making jewelry, wind chimes & keychains. This kit is filled with springtime color
JEWELRY KIT GIFT SET - An inspiring gift to encourage creativity in children. Comes with a case to take jewelry supplies on the go. For ages 6 and up
MAKE IT EASY TO BE ARTISTIC & CRAFTY - Simple user friendly instructions included in jewelry making kit to help walk you through your designs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars55 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
